backgroundColor.help: Changing this setting lags the wallpaper, give it a moment when changing

useDynamicColors.help: Use colors from the song art.

primaryColor.help: This setting is ignored when "Use dynamic colors" is enabled.

secondaryColor.help: This setting is ignored when "Use dynamic colors" is enabled.

lineColor.help: Changing this setting lags the wallpaper, give it a moment when changing

displayMusicArt.help: Disabling this will also disable "Dynamic colors".
